idea-plugin.name: Zelda Progress Bar
idea-plugin.description: This is the Zelda Progress Bar for JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA based on the Mario Progress Bar by Kylian Meulin and the Nyan Progress Bar by Dmitry Batkovitch. It displays Link on grass for the basic bar and a Cucco for the indeterminate one.
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1.0 Creation of the Zelda Progress Bar Project
